subtasks: Understand variables affecting application rates (tractor speed, spreader settings).
Choose an calibration method (load area or tarp).

tasks.task: Determine fertilizer needs based on nutrient management plan.
subtasks: Consider Minnesota regulations (cannot apply more N than crop needs).
Use calibration data to adjust application rates as necessary.
Record spreader gate or PTO settings.

tasks.task: Understand when to recalibrate the spreader.
subtasks: Check after changes in manure consistency or management practices.
Recalibrate every couple years to ensure accuracy.
